params.token: The address of the token to allow.

params._poolManager: Address of the Uniswap V4 PoolManager

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pay(address,uint256,address).details: Transfers tokens or swaps them using Uniswap V4.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to send.
params.inputToken: The stablecoin the sender is paying with.

params.token: The address of the token to disallow.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.token: The address of the preferred stablecoin.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

addStablecoin(address).notice: Adds a token to the list of allowed stablecoins.

pay(address,uint256,address).notice: Executes a payment from sender to recipient, converting stablecoins if needed.

poolManager().notice: Uniswap V4 PoolManager used for token swaps

preferredStablecoin(address).notice: Mapping of user addresses to their preferred stablecoin

removeStablecoin(address).notice: Removes a token from the list of allowed stablecoins.

setPreferredStablecoin(address).notice: Sets the sender's preferred stablecoin for receiving payments.
